snippet: The French energy giant agreed on Monday to buy the 30 percent of the British utility International Power that it does not already own after it increased its offer to $10 billion.
abstract: The French energy giant agreed on Monday to buy the 30 percent of the British utility International Power that it does not already own after it increased its offer to $10 billion.

headline.main: GDF Suez to Buy Remaining Stake in British Utility for $10 Billion
